EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Data_Workshop_Roadshow_2015.Sydney - 1 Week Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: See you next Wednesday, July 8th at the Pivotal Big Data Roadshow Workshop - Sydney
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Pivotal Big Data Roadshow Workshop coming up next Wednesday, July 8th in Sydney. We look forward to seeing you!
Please bring your laptop and power cord to fully participate in this hands-on workshop. A Mac or Linux environment is ideal. For the best workshop experience, please prep your laptop prior to attending following the “Workshop Prerequisites” listed below.
Pivotal Big Data Roadshow Wednesday, July 8th, 2015 8:15am - 2:00pm (breakfast & lunch provided) Workshop Agenda <http://pivotal.io/big-data/data-roadshow/sydney>
Pivotal Office Level 8, 175 Pitt St Sydney Maps & Directions
WORKSHOP PREREQUISITES All Hands-on Section
- VMware Player. Suggestions: VMware Player (Windows) OR VMware Fusion (MacOS). - RDP Client. Suggestions: coRD (MacOS), rDesktop (linux), Microsoft RDP (Windows)
*Access to VM instance will be provided
QUESTIONS? Contact Rushenka Perera at rperera@pivotal.io
We look forward to seeing you! The Pivotal Team
P.S.- Only a few spots remain! If you have a colleague interested in attending please forward on this link to the workshop details & registration <http://pivotal.io/big-data/data-roadshow/sydney>
